title: I can't disenchant skin shards or champion shards...
body: Since not too long ago, whenever I go in the loot section of the client I can't disenchant the shards that I get from the chests. Somehow I still can forge keys and open chests but I can't advance my mastery level on a champion. Do someone know how to fix it?

replies.body: currently having this issue. i will repar client and see if it works for me.

From what you said, it seems like you have two problems; both not being able to disenchant and not being able to craft Champion Mastery.

Is there any chance I could get a screen shot of what you see in Client when you try to do either of those things. It might help me ID what's causing it. Also, a quick fix you could try that usually helps with Loot is a Client Repair from the Settings menu. Try that out, and if it's still a problem afterward hit me up with those screens. :)
The client repair from the settings menu that you suggested worked perfectly. Thank you!
A'ight, awesome! Glad you're back to crafting! :D
